conclusion: Preliminary objection dismissed (Article 35-1 - Exhaustion of domestic remedies);No violation of Article 14+8 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination) (Article 8 - Right to respect for private and family life;Article 8-1 - Respect for family life)
docname: CASE OF ISMAILOVA v. RUSSIA - [Russian Translation]
issue: Family Code of the Russian Federation
